column4: will the ubuntu netbook remix work on any pc or just netbooks?
the ubuntu remix, is a low hardware solution?
you can probably install remix on any pc but you would lose your mind LoL

netbook is meant for netbooks that dont have the hardware of a desktop---like for video cards for example, you will have issues with compiz, it's easy to configure your machine to work like ubuntu remix flavor, youll have problems doing the opposite: http://helpforlinux.blogspot.com/2009/04/try-ubuntu-netbook-remix-on-desktop.html
so netbook remix, as it appears and looks is what i'd get.  simple menus, simple interface, simple desktop?
